resume_text:
NAME: David Brown
EMAIL: david.brown@example.com
PHONE: (555) 789-0123

SUMMARY:
Highly skilled Backend Developer with 7 years of experience in designing and developing scalable and robust server-side applications. Strong expertise in Java and Spring framework.

SKILLS:
Java, Spring, MySQL, REST APIs, Docker, AWS, Git

EXPERIENCE:
Tech Innovations - Senior Backend Developer (2019 - Present)
- Designed and developed REST APIs using Java and Spring.
- Implemented microservices architecture using Docker and Kubernetes.

Software Solutions - Backend Developer (2017 - 2019)
- Developed and maintained server-side applications using Java.
- Optimized database queries for improved performance.

EDUCATION:
University of Texas - Bachelor's in Computer Science (2017)

CERTIFICATIONS:
Oracle Certified Professional
